author: Sarah Terry
title: 11 totally fab gifts to show your BFF how much you love them this Valentine’s Day
text:
11 totally fab gifts to show your BFF how much you love them this Valentine’s Day February 14th is less than two weeks away, which means it’s time to start thinking about Valentine’s Day. Of course, we’re all planning special gifts for our S.O., but we want to celebrate our BFFs, too. According to the National Confectioners Association, most Americans want chocolate for Valentine’s Day. And of course, chocolate is delicious, but there are tons of other options for great gifts . We collected a list of fabulous gifts that will show your best friends how special they are. Because all our friends deserve to know how much we love them.
1. Champagne Gummy Bears will get you both a little tipsy. Sugarfina / www.sugarfina.com Made from Dom Perignon, these adorable gummies are available from Sugarfina starting at $8.50 .
2. She can work out with her heart out with this Heart Water Bottle. bkr / www.mybkr.com This fab glass water bottle is available from bkr for $35.00 .
3. A perfectly sweet candle will make her space her sanctuary. Anthropologie / www.anthropologie.com This stunning In Bloom Votive set is available from Anthropologie for $26.00 .
4. Make sure she can take her wine wherever with Vino2Go. Amazon / www.amazon.com This fabulous wine travel mug is available in multiple colors on Amazon for $14.99 .
5. Pamper you bestie with a set of face masks. Sephora / www.sephora.com This set of six different masks is available from Sephora for $25.00 .

6. She’ll never forget your undying BFF love when this pillow is glamming up her apartment. RocailStudio / www.etsy.com This adorable gold XOXO pillow is available at Etsy for $41.17 .
7. These mugs are perfect if your BFF likes her coffee with a little attitude. Mugarita / www.etsy.com These adorably sassy mugs are available from Etsy starting at $19.95 for the set.
8. This Wine Soap is perfect if your friend knows that booze isn’t only for drinking. Uncommon Goods / www.uncommongoods.com This set features soaps inspired by 4 different kinds of wine, so they’d go perfect with a bath and a glass of Cab. They’re available from Uncommon Goods for $28.00 .
9. Remind her that your friendship will last forever with this infinity bracelet. FrostedWillow / www.etsy.com This fab bangle gives new meaning to the word friendship bracelet, because it has the most subtle of symbolism. It’s available from Etsy starting at $14.95 , depending on the finish.
10. Don’t just get her chocolate, get her chocolate that’s totally awesome. Compartes / compartes.com You can find this Animal Cookies Chocolate Bar (and other amazing sweets) at Compartes for $9.95 .
11. And finally, to literally give your bestie heart eyes for you, get her these glasses for Valentine’s. Urban Outfitters / www.urbanoutfitters.com ?id=24036972&category=VDAY-GIFTS20 You can pick up these amazing heart-shaped sunglasses from Urban Outfitters for $16.00.
No matter what you get her, we know your BFF will totally appreciate an awesome Valentine’s Day gift. Because it’s always nice to be appreciated by the fabulous ladies who know you best.
